main event: A witness in County Darmstadt near Frankfurt, Germany observed a bright white, disc-shaped object that appeared to oscillate or flutter while moving horizontally from east to west.
interesting points: The object made no sound and disappeared from view.
The witness stated the object appeared to be higher than the adjacent buildings and trees and was about the size of a car.
The object's movement and appearance were consistent with a balloon or other airborne object.
No other substantive evidence was presented to indicate this was an unidentified flying object.
The sighting occurred over several days from March 20-25, 1961.
